Testimonials

Unlock Price Search by Price Pricing Export

Steve Padgett

Dealer Principal

Steve Padgett's Honda of Lake Murray
As car dealers, we can sometimes begin relationships with vendors based on the "wow" factor of what we believe their product can yield our dealerships. Often, these relationships fall short of expectations because the product does not deliver as promised and the company overpromises and underdelivers when it comes to customer service and overall responsiveness.
This has certainly not been the case with the team at RunMyLease. Not only has the "Unlock Price" product yielded the highest closing percentages of all of our lead sources, the customer service has been phenomenal. Simple tool, exceptional results and service.

Mike Maloney

Vice President of Marketing

Swickard Auto Group
At the Swickard Auto Group we started working with RunMyLease during the early days of the COVID pandemic. With a higher percentage of our customers seeking us out online, we wanted to open communication lines with them as quickly as possible while still protecting our pricing information from competitors.
We immediately saw an increase in lead volume and more importantly lead quality following the addition of the RunMyLease Unlock Price Tool to our website’s SRP and VDP pages. In addition to just a cleaner user experience, we felt as though it gave us extra credibility with our online shoppers as they saw we weren’t just begging for their information but were rather indicating that we also had something of value that we only wanted to share with confirmed potential buyers.
We definitely feel that RunMyLease has made us a better online dealership group

James Pool

General Sales Manager

Gallatin Honda
We love the Unlock Price Tool! I never knew that such an inexpensive tool could generate this much business... Every dealership should have it!
